posts.content: But let's be honest, most of us don't actually understand what's going on under the hood. Not because we don't care, but because not everyone has hours to sit through dense, technical lectures? So I built myself a shortcut. Public demo is open, no sign ups, with light caps so it stays stable. Built in public with a clean stack ...

Everyone's hyped about AI, but Olivia Gambelin's talk on "Elevating the Human in the Equation: Responsible Testing in the Age of AI." was a good reminder that real progress in testing/AI still comes from humans making smart, responsible choices. Tech is cool, but people > promises.
